'''METW: Galadriel''' is a game card from the set ''[[Middle-earth: The Wizards]]'', for [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game|MECCG]].

'''''Note:''''' ''"Galadriel" refers to [[Galadriel]] in [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[legendarium]].''

==Card text==

'''''Unique.''''' When Galadriel is at Lórien, her controlling player may keep one more card than normal in his hand. 

-3 marshalling points if eliminated. 

''"Tall and white and fair...and beautiful beyond enduring, terrible, and worshipful."'' '''''-[[The Lord of the Rings|LotRII]]'''''
